animeTitle: Detective Conan Movie 8 - Magician of the Silver Sky
otherNames: Meitantei Conan: Ginyoku no Magician, 名探偵コナン 銀翼の奇術師[マジシャン]
synopsis:
Maki Juri, a famous actress, asks Mouri Kogorou for help. It is to guess the true meaning of Kaitou Kid's preliminary announcement that he is going to steal her star sapphire ring, the Jewel of Fate.
Kogorou predicts that Kid will appear on the final day of the public performance of the play Maki Juri is in, and that he will rob the star sapphire during the play. The party of Kogorou, Ran, Conan, and the Detective Boys, who had been invited to the play in order to confirm whether a crime will take place as Kogorou predicts.
